extendedInfo.description: Detect ME is an Android app which helps you find your misplaced phone. Application has a smart inbuilt feature to switch your phone into Ringing mode if the phone was on Silent or Vibrate mode when it was lost/misplaced. Application has facility to send an emergency message so that you can send SMS to selected contact person by long click on Emergency button when you are in trouble.This helps users to locate the phone easily. But how this works?Detect ME has a facility to assign a person from your contact list who can call you when the phone is misplaced. So whatâs the idea behind this? The idea behind assigning such a contact person is that when this person calls the misplaced phone number, the phone automatically turns into ringing mode even though the phone was formerly on the Silent mode. The application also works by sending an SMS to the misplaced mobile which will convert the phone into the ringing mode. Besides, on sending the SMS to the lost phone, one can also get to know the current location of the phone so that the person can find the phone easily.Key highlights: â¢	Any number of contacts can be assigned to convert the phone into the ringing mode â¢	Each assigned person have to call up to 3 times (configurable) â¢	Facility to fix the duration of Meeting Hours. During this duration, the phone will be restrained from diverting to Ringing mode â¢	Facility to customize and pre-defined the message in the app for sending to the misplaced phone â¢	Facility to send Emergency SMS by long click on Emergency button.With these features, Detect ME is your perfect partner to quickly find your misplaced and lost phone.So, next time when you misplace your phone, take the help of Find My Phone/SMS Alert which will help you locate it easily with its ingenious functionality.Keywords: sms, ROM manager, Emergency SMS, skype, sms alert, ICE, whatsapp, go sms, handcent, find your phone, phone find, find, sms pager, voxer, sms auto, tasker, sms, whatsapp, handcent, tasker, kakaotalk, viber, emergency alert, ICE, textgram, facebook, instapaper, instagram, IT, tools, chrome, firefox

reviews.title: nice app. .After fixing the bug it\'s working fine now
reviews.comment: cool&useful application. .For every one who are frequently keep their device in silent or vibration mode.
reviews.author: Vissu Viswanath

reviews.title: Dont show this bug
reviews.comment: Nice app but have many bugs.... Like initial page of about comes everytime we open the app eventhough you tick dont show this again.....
reviews.author: Ravi Jadav

reviews.title: Really smart !!
reviews.comment: It always bug us to find our phone which get misplace &  unfortunately on silent mode. But thanks to this smart app which turns my phone from silent mode to ring/normal mode simply on call from my picked numbers.   Really good work.
reviews.author: RIKESH SHAH

reviews.title: Makes Life Easy
reviews.comment: Generally speaking application is very conceptual for all working people, I use to keep my mobile on silent mode in office and many times i missed some important call specially from my family. Now no worries.  Thanks for the application.
reviews.author: Dushyant Thakar

reviews.title: Useful App
reviews.comment: It would be a great help if you change the color scheme of \"Incomming Settings\" screen because it does not match with current color scheme of the app. Great Efforts. Keep it up.
reviews.author: sameer z

reviews.title: Good concept
reviews.comment: I like the features of this application. Specially that SMS facility, which helps you to find your current location.
reviews.author: John Patel

reviews.title: Very Nice App
reviews.comment: I will also recommend to my friends
reviews.author: Durgesh Patel

reviews.title: Best utility app
reviews.comment: Very useful in emergencies and when you have lost your phone.
reviews.author: Premal Dave
